moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. d4: The Scotch is an opening in my resume
moves.8... Nxe5 9. Qe2 d6: ??? bad move for him as well
moves.10... dxc5 11. Qxe5+ Qe7 12. Qxe7+ Bxe7: I enjoy playing the Scotch because it reduces the pieces on the board and I end up playing games like this. Ending the middle game and going into the endgame with only 14 moves!
moves.17... g6 18. O-O: ?? At this far into the game, my king could have been turned into a fighting piece.
moves.18... b6 19. Nb5 Re8 20. Nd6+ Bxd6 21. R: !!! Black was sure playing better for the endgame. Here he had a chance to double his rooks on his 7th rank, A fatal tactic I might add.
moves.24... fxg4 25. Kg2 Kb8 26. Kg3 Re4 27. R: This is where I got scared His king is advancing into my side
!! His king is now stuck. This lucky plan started when I moved my f pawn and my king
